channel.title: Need help with safezone setting. I got the code, I just don't understand it
channel.description:
Ok I am trying to make safezones on a hiyascape server that are around the shops and that is it. I know you may think that sounds stupid but I have an awesome plan.
[code]|| (absX >= 3229 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 9796 && absY <= 9807)[/code]
Ok theres the code for a nonwild area. I don't understand how to read it exactally. If I am trying to make a box that is a safezone, how would I enter in the coordinates into that code of the box I want around the shop area?

item.title: Need help with safezone setting. I got the code, I just don't understand it
item.dc:creator: @Slappa4 Slappa4
item.description:
@Slappa4 wrote:

Ok I read that but it wasn’t clear to me. This is what I got from that topic.

These are my coords
Top left: X = 2519 Y = 3906
Bottom left: X = 2519 Y = 3877
Bottom right: X = 2557 Y = 3877
Top right: X = 2557 Y = 3906

So thoes coords make up my square or rectangle whatever shape it comes out to be. In the first example of that topic, the code used to show a coordinate was this:

|| (absX >= 3343 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3441 && absY <=3523 ) ||

So in my case for my first coordinate, top left, would be

|| (absX >= 2519 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3906 && absY <=3523 ) ||

Then the second code used is showing how to make the square I am guessing. The code was this:

|| (absX >= FIRST COORD .A. && absX <= FIRST COORD .B. && absY >= SECOND COORD .A. && absY <=SECOND COORD .B. ) ||

This is the part where I get confused. Jcrane says that FIRST COORD .A. is my X coordinate, and that SECOND COORD .A. is my Y coordinate. Then Jcrane says that to get FIRST COORD .B. I will have to go to the right top and get my X coordinate, and then for SECOND COORD .B. I am guessing I will have to go to the right bottom to get my Y coordinate.

The part I don’t understand is that there is a X coordinate and a Y coordinate for EACH corner, yet from what I understand, Jcrane is saying to take the X coordinate only from my top left, my Y coordinate from my bottom left, my X coordinate from my top right, and my Y coordinate from my bottom right. But this wouldn’t make a square. So going back to the first code… or better yet, using the code that is in my servers nonwild() section I am guessing I am going to have to have 4 lines of code, each line telling a coordinate, am I right?

That would look like this:

|| (absX >= 2519 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 3906 && absY <= 9807) || (absX >= 2519 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 3877 && absY <= 9807) || (absX >= 2557 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 3906 && absY <= 9807) || (absX >= 2557 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 3877 && absY <= 9807)

Is that correct? I don’t think it is but mabye I got lucky. Please, any help would be awesome, I am totally lost here. I don’t think I will be on much longer tonight but I will stop in and check this topic later. Also sorry this is so long and if it is confusing I apologize again. Not the best coder out there… Well thanks in advance. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2008, 06:29:18 PM[/size][hr]Holy crap… It worked! Awesome! Thanks I Br3ndan I for the link to that topic! Helped alot!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with safezone setting. I got the code, I just don't understand it
